house_listing.house_description: Sparkling light & brite custom built Morton home. 3 full baths, one bedroom downstairs for guest or office. Wood finish laminate floor entry & family room, formal dining, crown molding in dining and family room. Brick fireplace with oak trim and gas logs. Large island kitchen, JennAir cooktop, oven & microwave, big breakfast area, utility w/room for freezer. Sprinkler system.

highlights.item: Wood finish laminate floor entry and family room.
Crown molding indining and family room.
Brick fireplace w/oak trim & gas logs
